title: Google\Cloud\Sql\V1beta4\ExportContext\SqlExportOptions\MysqlExportOptions
name: MysqlExportOptions
description:
Options for exporting from MySQL.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.sql.v1beta4.ExportContext.SqlExportOptions.MysqlExportOptions

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.master_data
params.description: Option to include SQL statement required to set up replication. If set to 1, the dump file includes a CHANGE MASTER TO statement with the binary log coordinates, and --set-gtid-purged is set to ON. If set to 2, the CHANGE MASTER TO statement is written as a SQL comment and has no effect. If set to any value other than 1, --set-gtid-purged is set to OFF.

methods.description:
